subject: Hockey, Ice

Wages and Salaries
lead_paragraph: Donald Fehr, the departing executive director of the Major League Baseball Players Association, is working in an advisory capacity with the N.H.L. players union.
snippet: Donald Fehr, the departing executive director of the Major League Baseball Players Association, is working in an advisory capacity with the N.H.L. players union.
